import React, {useState} from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import "./css/register.css" const initialstate = { prenom: "", nom: "", email: "", password: "" } function Register() { const [formData, setFormData ] = useState(initialstate) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } return (
